titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/14/2001--Passed Senate without amendment. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from February 14, 2001, until February 26, 2001, and from February 26, 2001, until February 27, 2001, and for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from February 15 or 16, 2001, until February 26, 2001.
